summary: A small player home in Riverville.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#e69138][size=6]Golden Mare Mill[/size][/color]

This here is a small cabin and windmill in Riverville for Enderal.
- You must complete the side-quest '[color=#e69138]Secret of the Can[/color]' in order to gain ownership!-
English Version Only.

Golden Mare Mill provides an easy and quaint player home in the scenic area of Riverville for the player, relatively early on in the game. It provides several amenities, regardless of its size; Weapon racks, safe-storage bookshelves and cupboards, unique decor.
There are no crafting stations, to give the player a reason to go into town now and then.
The mill itself isn't necessarily functional. It's more for flavor, to roleplay the experience of a miller (who happens to be a bit wealthier than usual).
Unique aspects are tied into this home, such as transparent windows, sound effects, a swinging exterior door, among other small things.

The cabin is located near the beachside shrine outside of town. I hope you enjoy!
[/center]
author: ClefJ
